definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
third plenum of a national congress of the Chinese Communist Party
plenary session of the Central Committee

sentences.english: The 16th National Party Congress put forward for strengthen the party's ability to govern.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六屆四中全會提出加強黨的執政能力建設。

sentences.english: Large anti-Japanese protests erupted during the latest party meeting.
sentences.chinese: 大規模的抗日遊行在此次五中全會期間爆發。

sentences.english: Structuring a harmoniously socialist society was definitely brought forth on the 4th Plenary Session of the 16th CCCP.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六屆四中全會明確提出構建社會主義和諧社會。

sentences.english: Till the party 3 in after plenary meeting, just get rehabilitating exonerating .
sentences.chinese: 直到黨的十一屆三中全會後，纔得到平反昭雪。

sentences.english: The 3rd Plenary Session decided on two things.
sentences.chinese: 當年的三中全會決定了兩件事。

sentences.english: It is more connected with vacuums than with plenums, more with mind than with body.
sentences.chinese: 這是涉嫌與比全會真空，多與精神與身體。

sentences.english: This was taken to the anxiety and fear of the upcoming Fifth Plenary Session of the Fifth.
sentences.chinese: 這種憂慮和恐懼被帶到即將召開的五屆五中全會中了。

sentences.english: This article is the understanding of the author on the Fifth Plenary Session of 14th Central Committee of C.
sentences.chinese: 此文是作者學習十四屆五中全會精神的一點體會。

sentences.english: At the Third Plenary Session in 1950, I spoke against hitting out in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 一九五零年，我在三中全會上說過，不要四面出擊。

sentences.english: The amendment had been approved at the Seventh Plenary Session of the 16th CPC Central Committee that closed on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 本週五結束的十六屆七中全會已經批准了《修正案》。

sentences.english: Shortly after the plenum ended, authorities were convening an International Daoism Forum.
sentences.chinese: 全會結束後不久，當局召開了一次國際道教論壇。

sentences.english: At the plenary of July 31, I addressed the issue of Prevention of an Arms Race in Outer Space (PAROS).
sentences.chinese: 在7月31日的全會上，我就外空問題做了發言。

sentences.english: The Third Plenary Session formulated or, one might say, reaffirmed the Party's ideological line.
sentences.chinese: 三中全會確立了或者說重申了黨的思想路線。

sentences.english: If not, let us declare that the Sixth Plenary Session of the Eleventh Central Committee has successfully completed its work.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，我們就宣佈第六次中央全會勝利閉幕。

sentences.english: The plenary session manages by Central Political Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 全會由中央政治局主持。

sentences.english: Communist Party of China addresses strengthening the construction of Party's administrative capacity in the Fourth Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六屆四中全會提出要加強黨的執政能力建設。
